abilities.name: Anti
abilities.text: Lightning - You can't attach Lightning Energy cards to Zapdos from your hand to Zapdos.

attacks.name: Plasma
attacks.text: If there are any Energy cards in your discard pile, flip a coin. If heads attach 1 of them to Zapdos.

attacks.name: Lightning Storm
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, put 2 damage counters on Zapdos.
